segments.text: Would you find any other available flight to Tokyo ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr.Chen , are you sure you're taking BA - 007 back to Tokyo ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . I think our travel agent would have made the reservation for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid this flight is all booked up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure ? We can't really take it ? I reconfirmed with Miss Peterson the other day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid so except we have many no-show passengers .
segments.speaker: S2
